title: Analysis of heavy metals and pathogen levels in vegetables cultivated using selected water bodies in urban areas of the Greater Accra Metropolis of Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Shine Francis Gbedemah, Alain Attasse Gbeasor, Gideon Selorm Hosu-Porbley, Louis Kusi Frimpong, Richard Amfo-Otu, Selase Kofi Adanu, Eric Kofi Doe
